Detailed Description

template<typename TYPE>
class AccumulatingEMA< TYPE >

This templated class is a helper class for accumulating values, and periodically sampling that value into an EMA.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

AccumulatingEMA< TYPE >::AccumulatingEMA ( float  bias,
float  initialAverage = 0.f,
TYPE  initialValue = TYPE() 
) [inline]

Constructor.

Parameters:
bias Determines the exponential bias.
initialAverage The initial value of the average.
initialValue The initial value of the accumulated value.

Member Function Documentation

template<typename TYPE>
float AccumulatingEMA< TYPE >::average (  )  const [inline]

Average accessor.

template<typename TYPE>
void AccumulatingEMA< TYPE >::sample ( bool  shouldReset = true  )  [inline]

Sample method.

This should be called periodically to sample the accumulated value into the weighted average. The accumulated value is converted to a float before sampling.

Parameters:
shouldReset If true, the accumulated value is reset to the TYPE default (e.g. 0 for numeric TYPEs) after sampling. If false, it is unchanged.
